I wish I could have given this zero stars because it doesn’t deserve even one.  It is not freezer tape!!  It is stretchy and all of the rolls were stuck together in the package. What a waste of money!! Do NOT buy this!!

I saw this planner in the store and loved it.  Plus it's USA made.  I looked it up on Amazon on my phone and saw it was cheaper so I decided to order it.  I didn't read close in the store that they decide your planner cover.  Luckily I caught it before I placed my order at home.  UGH, back to the store....so aggravating!!  Five stars for the planner, 1 star for not letting you select your own cover.

Unfortunately my HP OfficeJet 8600 Plus rejected these cartridges. I always buy when expecting them to be replaced in a month or so. The box looks like real HP ones and they fit in the proper installation place. I am giving 2 stars because the service by Amazon is always excellent. I'm wondering is it too late to return them.

I was very disappointed to find that, although the product description is for various shapes (heart, star, loop), and one of the product photos depicted these three shapes, what I received was 50 of only the loop shape.  I specifically ordered this item, instead of other options, because of the variety of shapes I thought I was ordering.  I'm keeping the item because I need it now, but I'm not satisfied with this order.

Not impressed! This whiteboard seemed like it would be perfect for the job, so I had high hopes when I ordered it.  Unfortunately, it came with small dings and dents in several areas.  I was able to get beyond that because I was eager to get it hung and use in my office and they were relatively small spots.  Once hung, I was super unimpressed with the marker tray - it attaches with double sided tape!! So far, its sagged and fell twice!The part that really bothers me the most, is that the SINGLE marker it came with was completely dried out.  When I went to use a typical Expo marker, the ink bubbled up as if it were not compatible with the board surface.  I tried a different brand and it won't erase! I should have sent it back - it's a process through my department to requisition items and then to return, so I was just trying to let it go but, man this board sucks.So to sum up:- came dented- only one marker included- marker was bone dry, therefore not functional- other markers won't work or won't erase (see pics)- marker tray comes unattached due to cheap designI would have gave 0 stars if possible!!

If you don’t mind that each inch is divided into 10ths, these triangles will likely do a fine job for you.They’re otherwise as described... ALTHOUGH, mine arrived in what appears to be used condition.  i.e. - While these supposedly new triangles arrived in a protective sleeve, they both have the micro scratches that tend accumulate on plastic over some period of normal use, as well as one of them having smear marks from something being spilled and not comepletly wiped off / cleaned.Giving two stars because this needs to be called out and addressed... I could see giving 1 star, but they do function as 360/60/90 and 45/90 triangles.(To the seller...  They’re coming back.)

the push pin is glued to the wood pin.  The push pin separates from the wood pin in your hand while attempting to use.  Disintegrates in your hand.  Complete trash.  I would give this zero stars across the board if possible.  Do not even consider ordering.  Any positive reviews are clearly entered by the seller.

Wish I would have read reviews, but I was looking for white-out tape quickly and chose this product. Literally the second time I used it, it broke. I don't have big hopes for the second one in the package.
Waste of money to purchase. I would have given it no stars if that was possible!  The markers wipe off easily from the material and do not want to stick… cheap product
Didn’t get a transparent one but solid blue one. 1 star for false advertisement.

Well as other reviews have mentioned, this thing is TINY! It was bought as fun novelty item for my desk and it really isn't functional at all. It's just too small and honestly, it takes two seconds to brush something off your desk. DEFINITELY overpriced! Shouldn't be more than a buck or two.

I was so excited to get this desk and there's a lot to love about it!- It fits my oversized laptop very well.- The wrist rest is the perfect height and made of memory foam, so it conforms to your wrists.- The desk is curved, to allow for you to bring it closer to you.- The light is easy to tuck away and it doesn't create any strange bulges or uncomfortable points.- The "wood" looks real and is beautifully done.So, why did I only rate it two stars?- I added the batteries (it requires 4 AA). First, the battery case is very tight, making it difficult to place batteries in and nearly impossible to get them out again.- Once I put in (brand new) batteries, and plugged in the light, nothing happened! The light didn't turn on and that was a major selling point of this desk for me. I'm greatly disappointed.I'll update this review if anything changes, but as of now, I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who's choosing it based on there being a light.

Mat cracked after one month of use.  Not even asking for a refund just throwing it away.  I've spent 10s of thousands on amazon and have yet to write a review.  This product is so bad I figured i'd take the time to warn others of this garbage product.  This mat also slides around on my carpet, and thus was hitting my desk.  It damaged the bottom half inch of my 2,000 dollar desk by slowly chipping away at it.  I weigh 145 pounds and cracked this mat in a month, what a pos.  Buyer and amzon beware.

I rarely write reviews, but I'll make an exception in this case.Your shredder was horrible. Could barely do four sheets when I first got it, kept overheating and making popping/clicking sounds, and now not working at all. Complete junk. In this case brand name is probably the way to go.

Lasted 5 months, and now it barely works.  Not sure why it doesn't work anymore like it used to.Previous 5 star review: works great, I just put it on my desk and slide the envelope upside down across the blade.  will update in the future if I discover more info.
I've never written a review before but I felt so moved by this awful product to take action. It came missing 5 crucial pieces and the quality is flimsy and poor.DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM

This is a ridiculous, stupid and DANGEROUS idea. People, you do NOT NEED your electronic devices or food in front of you when you are in your car in the DRIVER'S seat!!! If you must work on your device, do it at at HOME or at the OFFICE, and NOT in the car. I am POSITIVE people are thinking they can multitask and work on their device or eat while they are driving. This is what this stupid thing is promoting and I do NOT LIKE IT. If a person is THAT addicted to their device and needs it in their face while driving, that person needs serious, professional help. I do not give a flying rat's behind if a person is stopped at a light or whatever. STAY OFF THE DEVICE until you get home or to the office or to a place where one is NOT on the road. The same goes for eating while driving. This thing should be illegal, because someone is going to cause an accident while having a device or food in their face while driving.I sincerely HOPE all the people giving this screen addiction device 5 stars are NOT using it while on the road at ANY time. Anyone who is using it deserves a ticket for distracted driving. Sorry. I like safe drivers and not the ones who can't keep their hands off their devices or food while driving.
If I could give this item zero stars, I would. Awful quality. Everything is a keychain or mini. These items don’t help anxiety or stress, if anything it adds stress.
Completely fell apart during first time of use, despite assembling according to instructions. Zero stars.

This is a good, cheap matte paper - but beware, strong ink coverage cause it to buckle due to it's weight. I can't really recommend this paper for proofing, due to it's size...make sure you review the paper's weight before you purchase.

My print jobs are coming out with words that are pink in random places. This is happening on basic prints that should be all black.I'm updating this review as after maybe 50 pages of printing, text not pictures, I'm now out of ink. And still after all this time my basic black and white pages kept printing pink. I'll never buy ink that isn't original.

This product worked great for the few first few days.  But then I started having issues with the blade not cutting through cleanly.  Most paper cutters are way overpriced and still have horrible reviews and don't work right. I went with this product because of the price and the reviews it had. Very disappointed!

If I could give zero stars I would. I ordered the bright simple different print thank you cards that were shown in the description yet these white cards are what I got. (Even the envelopes aren’t the same & no thank you stickers) I even went back to double check what I had ordered. Not pleased and not happy yet I don’t want to go through the trouble of sending these back. I wouldn’t purchase these again, obviously!!!

Absolute Junk! Both cartridges leaked toner all over the place. What a waste of money. Printed well for about ten pages each, then turned to crap. Would have gave zero stars, but the only option was one.

I was extremely disappointed in this planner. If I could give this 0 stars I would. From July 2018-November 2018 this planner is a MESS. I’ve included some pictures to show. It starts with a monthly spread of July where the numbers are miss printed and duplicated. There are also dates missing. Then it goes to August where it starts with one page of an August weekly spread but once again dates are missing. It has Aug. 1, 5,6,7,8. On the next page it goes back to July’s weekly spreads beginning with July 9. After the July weekly spreads it goes to August monthly spread. Then, to September weekly spread beginning with September 3 but numbers are once again duplicated on the next page. It has 2 pages of September’s weekly spread and then jumps back to August’s weekly spread. This is a recurring thing all the way to the 2nd November 2018 tab which it oddly has.The planner is good starting from the 2nd November 2018 tab, but I need the planner now and can’t wait until November to begin using it. Starting in November it begins with a monthly spread and leads into the weekly spreads. I am very disappointed as I am a teacher and was excited to use this as my new planner for the year.

Upon arrival, I installed the cartridge per installation instructions. After closing the access door, the toner goes through a setup process. At this stage my printer started making this god awful grinding noise. After further investigating, the toner cartridge was actually cracked and the green bar was actually black from ink coating it. It printed a completely black page every time. I also noticed that the "qc ok" sticker was previously cut, which lead me to believe these are remanufactured. I'm not biased on remanufactured items, but I did not recall seeing this in the item description prior to placing this order. I originally picked 1 star but as I wrote this review, I upped it to 2 stars on ease of return
Purchased and my printer says incompatible cartridge has been installed and will not print. Disappointed based upon the reviews.

Pay close attention to the size of this planner, I unfortunately did not. I was looking for something a little bigger. This is small, 4 x 6. I didn't pay attention to the size or reviews and purchased.

I ordered this and received a package with an old expiration date.  I wrote to amazon.com and they sent me a replacement- and ANOTHER defective package.  I STILL have not received my refund!I only gave it 1 star because they made me- otherwise it would be ZERO.

I gave it 2 stars because it does what it does ok and for some people it will be fine. It's flimsy and thin but made ok. My issue is that I went to Target and found a "Much" higher quality date book for $3 less.

Not sure why everyone else is giving this 5 stars, as my print quality is so poor I can barely read the printing. Seriously, I brought an agenda to a meeting and someone else had to read it for me. My eyesight is not great, but I can usually read the printed documents. It's just kind of blurry, not crisp at all. If you don't care about the quality, then this would be fine.

Horrible phone system.Can't check call logs(incoming and outgoing). Can only check missed calls. If there is a missed call, all phones will get a miss call notification. You then have to manually clear the missed call on every individual phone. There is no clear all miss call. You have to scroll through every miss call on every phone to clear it.Buttons are hard to push. As you dial the buttons, it makes a sound tone acknowledging you dialed the button. But if you dial the numbers faster than 1 sec interval, it skips the sound tone making you think it didn't register.Can't block numbers. You have to call your phone provider to block numbersReception was ok. I was at about 100ft away from the base with no static problem.  There was only a single wall of obstruction between where I was standing and the base.Would not recommend this phone. Phone was so bad I had to write my first review about it.
It's not what we received. We got a pack of mini, normal markers so couldn't use then with the white board. What we got is ok but not what we needed hence the 2 stars.

55 stickers for 13 dollars is a rip off.  Not happy with the quality and not happy with the amount.  They make it look like your getting way more then 55 stickers.  One review even said she got 12 sheets of stickers.

I bought this product because of the great reviews, first off it was broken when I got it.  I had to super glue the battery compartment back in place, second off within the first 20 minutes of playing with the light I broke one of the clips.  Third its not adjustable at all so even though it just barely fits underneath my legs in bed, it doesn't leave much for switching positions and you feel pretty much like its glued onto you and you can't move.  Fourth the laptop sits to the left which is really kind of annoying and makes it very uncomfortable for long durations of typing.  Fifth it is very poorly designed, no metal, just VERY cheap plastic, with sharp edges, etc.The mouse pad is the best feature of the entire thing, another reason I chose this over others, but if you are sitting in bed or on the couch you tend to sit at an angle and the mouse will slide right off the thing if you let go of it for say two handed typing.  So it just makes for an awkward experience overall.  It is functional I guess, I could have made the same thing with four legs and a plank of wood though... Oh! and its 19.99 at Bed, Bath & Beyond, yeah so that made me mad as well...

I never write reviews unless something was either really great or didn't live up to my expectations. Unfortunately this product was did not live up to the hype. It does a fairly decent job of picking up the hair, however once the roller has made a couple of passes you need to clean it before you can finish. To stop , rinse and dry 8 times to clean a five foot love seat is way more trouble than it is worth. Don't waste your money folks!

Removed a few staples before the thick point bent and then there was no leverage.  Poor design.  If you hold the handle, which you need to do to use it, and push down at the last second you need to remove your fingers from the handle or they will get smashed.I too cannot imagine why anyone would give this piece of junk any stars other than one so that they could write a review.

I should have read ALL the reviews before purchase. Received the cartridges in the actual box. But low and behold, when inserting the cartridges into my HP Officejet Pro 8600 Plus printer, the warning screen appeared with: "Cartridge is empty and/or counterfeit."Buyer beware!

After I had read all the reviews, I ordered the ink thinking that I wouldn’t have any problems, yet  the ink I had ordered wasn’t compatible with my printer.  Not satisfied with the quality of the ink.  From this point forward I will ordered directly from the nearest store nearby.

I read many reviews on this product and most were unfavorable but I tried it anyway.  The key was very difficult to get into the lock.  Once it did get it, it worked to unlock the item but then got stuck and I cannot get the key out now.  Returning this product within 10 minutes of its arrival.  Bad product!!!

If you're expecting to buy this item and get 144 clips like the smaller version you can just forget about it. These medium size clips are available at Officemax.com for $2.99 for a dozen pcs. so the $11.01(at the time of my purchase) is totally unreasonable and must be some sort of packaging or shipping error but according to other reviews it always happens. My guess is that anyone who hasn't complained or made a return has just assumed that they got what they paid for.

The reason for the two stars is because of the clip. I clip it to my belt or my belt loop and it constantly bends, unclipping it, and falls on the ground. If you are using this for an ID access badge, I have had to slide my ID out to use it then slide it back in.

The packet photograph  this  describes these  as expander discs However please be warned these are mini discs and not suitable for the standard size happy planner. I appreciate the picture of the discs are small.  On receipt of these the packet clearly states mini discs which is different to the photo on amazonIf I had a mini happy planner and wanted this size they would be 5 stars but lose stars for confusing descriptor on photograph.

Whats to say they write... however I did expect a little more heft to them.  This is the lightest (metal) pen by far I have ever held.Edit: I have had this pen a few weeks and  am now lowering my rating the pen is crap if I leave it laying on its side it wont write the next time I pick it up, even my 25 cent bic can handle that.

I never leave bad reviews but these are absolutely the worst stickers I've ever encountered. I am a kindergarten teacher and my students are required to wear name tags for the first week of school. I thought I was getting a good deal on a pack of 200 however they are missing the most important function of a sticker because they don't stick to anything!!
There seems to be a lot of mixed colours here.  So i am just writing about this one.  Charcoal grey not black.  Two stars for drying quickly.  The colour is atrocious.

Unfortunately I have to update my review.  The break away feature is not very "break-away."  A stick somehow woven through the collar and twisted around my cats neck. He went unconscious before I found him and unfasten the collar.  He lived but upon further inspection the collar too several pounds of force to unlatch.  The remaining two were the same.  It was a design flaw.  The collar does not break away easily.  Sorry.  Was excited about this item.

Save your money -- this safe failed in within a few months of purchase. Like others on Amazon have mentioned, the locks failed for no apparent reason. I'm glad the lock mechanism failed when the safe was in an open position so I could retrieve the items I had stored, but there's really no excuse for putting such a shoddy product on the market.I rarely write reviews, but this safe has earned its single star rating. Seriously, don't even think about placing your valuables in one of these safes. If it can't stand up to being opened once a month, I can't imagine it would actually hold up during a fire or flood. Also, when the safe fails, making contact with customer service will be a pain since Honeywell doesn't provide customer service for these items and has a third party in charge of replacements.

I hate giving bad reviews but the quality of these tools were shockingly poor.  it would be a good deal if not for the fact that none of it is usable except the pencils.  The compasses don't hold in place...so they don't work.  the one that has a lock to make sure it stays in place literally fell apart in my hands before using it the first time, and it was too tiny to be of any use.

This product is extremely hard to assemble. The screws are not the correct type for this assembly and many screws were broken when it arrived. A few essential parts of the locker were bent, meaning we had to try to bend them back into place for the screws to fit properly. However, it looks very cute in my house that’s why I’m giving 2 stars.

As I read in one of the latest reviews, don't buy these. They are good wheels, but everything else is not. the pivot bearings kept falling out because the metal they made the wheel frame was not capable of holding the loads stated in the ad.  the rivet pulled through and the wheel finally came off.The first time the warranty was very easy to find and to get replaced. Now I can't locate the link. Every time I go to their page,  it takes me to another page.

Revised Review:  So after about 400 hours this bulb is quickly looking brightness.  The screen is so dim it is difficult to see unless the room is at absolute total darkness.  I expect it to totally fail any moment now.  This is not a good long term solution.Initial Review:  I was very worried about ordering this bulb after reading the split reviews but for this price vs. a new one I thought it was worth a try (my original bulb only lasted 1600 hours, not 4000 as it should have).  It has now been installed for a few weeks and so far the color is good, the brightness is good and no bad behaviors like a bad smell.

The armrests fit, so they get a second star.  There screw holes are too shallow, however, so they will not screw fully down on my Office Depot chair.  Already the screws push against the padding and you have to back off.  Very cheap stuff.
Printer couldn't read them. Troubleshooting manual wasn't useful at all and I did waist 3 days. I'm giving them 2 stars because I got my money back, that's it.
Leaked all over...every one of them. Threw them away!  Doesn't eve, deserve one star!

the post said it worked for the 952 we did everything the instructions told us to and nothing worked we did not try to use them until after the expiration date of return so now we are stuck with a product we cant use and had to order the correct ones. Not happy at all if I could rate less than 1 I would

The black cartridge printed exactly 2 sheets of paper before being empty. Replaced it with the 2nd black cartridge, it was good for 1. The quality of print was terrible as if it were nearly out of ink, surprise, it was.Fuzoo has emailed me several times telling me that they were going to give me a refund and asked me to edit or remove this review. The refund has never been given yet they continue to email me. I can't, in good conscience, remove or change the review. The cartridges functioned exactly as I have described, whether or not they choose to refund my money.

My rating was lowered from four stars to two stars after I had to add update number 2.  Definitely pass on this one.This is a large unit.  I use it in an elementary classroom.  The sharpener dials to fit six different pencil sizes which is very convenient for the classroom.  It has an adequate shaving recepticle and is easily emptied.  (I also use the  Stanley Bostitch QuietSharp Executive in the classroom. That unit is more quiet than this one is and it is smaller. It does not handle varied sizes and that recepticle is quite small.)  The Swingline unit is very easy for the children to use and we do not have problems with jamming--I stopped using electric sharpeners in the classroom for several years because of jamming.  The swingline sharpens pencils smoothly as well.UPDATE #1:After using this a bit longer in the classroom I feel the need to update the review. The sharpener jams up and stops working. Sometimes leaving it idle for a short time is enough and we can then sharpen a few pencils but other times we go for days with it not working. Although this is in a classroom it does not get heavy use as we have more than shaprener in the room. It seems that the sensor for activating the sharpener is really faulty.UPDATE #2: this sharpener tends to implement the safety that prevents it from "overheating" a bit too readily.  After two pencils being sharpened, it often shuts down.  Although it has various openings, it also is a bit "touchy" about how the pencil is inserted.  My original rating is 4 stars but I think I would have to reduce that to 3 stars.  I find my cheaper units to be more reliable.A custodian knocked the unit onto the floor and the black plastic around the opening cracked. If the plastic is held just right it will partially sharpen still.  I think it is disappointing that the motor is OK but a crack in the housing prevents us from still using this unit.

I bought this product to help with groceries as I live on the top floor of an apartment building . Seemed sturdy and durable . Was a little smaller then I thought it would have been however there was missing parts . I was unable to assemble because the axel was missing for the back wheels . After receiving the item I seen many reviews stating the same . I contacted the original company and they were willing to send me the missing pieces but I just sent it back

Two minutes ago the plastic channels that were supposed to hold the plastic + poster + backing sandwich together let go. Three channels, the plastic, and the poster fell to the hardwood floor -- the corner of the plastic shattered and the poster was folded under and creased. This is a poor design badly implemented because the channels were loose from the beginning and the plastic was too thin. With nothing but friction to hold the channels in place I should have known that failure was inevitable. Thicker plastic or tighter channels or thicker backing or some sort of ridge on the backing for the channels to grip might have salvaged the design but now it is too late. How does one return something like this? Will they replace my poster? I would have given zero stars in the rating had that been possible.

I would have given this product a higher rating had all of the pieces been included. Three of the days of the week were missing. I didn't realize it until I got to work and started setting up the calendar. I had to white out three duplicate days and write in with marker the days that were missing.This was not what I paid for. The quality of the materials seem to be durable, but I wouldn't purchase this again.

I wanted to like these, but...I bought a 2-pack of the Linkyo HP-compatible toner cartridges for my HP2035 laser printer. Good price, good reviews, I thought. The first one worked rather well and seemed to yield the promised 2,300 pages. The second one, however, immediately put a series of dark gray blotches along the right margin of the page, 7 in all, each about 3/4" wide. The more pages I printed, the worse they got, clearly a defect in the remanufacturing process. (I'm a retired quality assurance manager. A 50% defect rate in a random sample of 2 items is not a good sign. It could be that I just happened to get the random defect, but... In normal sampling inspection, 1 defect in a random sample of 2 would usually cause the entire lot to be rejected, depending on the specified Acceptable Quality Level, or AQL.)The bottom line is that I can't use toner cartridges that leave blotches. Period. Linkyo's price advantage pretty much vanished when cartridge #2 failed the minute it was installed. I have never had a problem with genuine HP cartridges and I don't consume them so quickly that the cost per year is an obstacle.As I said, the first one of the two was just fine. Hopefully, you'll get the "good one". I just can't recommend them based on my experience.
If I could give this zero stars, I would. Assembly was like something out of a comedy skit. This is potentially the most impractical piece of equipment I’ve ever come across.
Product description stated "Legal Rule" but actual notepads were wide rule.  Two stars because they were actually notepads with accurate sheet counts.

This product is a no for me! It definitely isn't a planner for 2019. The first page is Jan 2018! I saw some positive reviews made in Nov and Dec which led me to purchase it. I am wondering how they will deal with their expired planners.

If a choice of zero rating was available, I would not even give this product a 1. Most of the cartridges did not work right out of the package (3 of 5 black and 2 of 3 color were defective), and those that did only lasted a small fraction of the time compaired to Canon cartridges.Print colors were a very poor replication of screen colors. This purchase was a hugh waste of money.
I bought this despite seeing the bad ratings. The ink card fit my printer, the first print was flawless, but then the second print was dry as a bone, The ink has suddenly vanished.
I bought the double pack and neither cartridge worked with my Samsung M2825DW printer. A that failure rate, I have absolutely NO idea how this product could be so highly rated here.

Our old set of Fiskars micro tip scissors were getting dull. When ordering a replacement I saw this sharpener and thought it might be useful for keeping both sets sharp. I was taken by the term "Universal" and the fact that both were made by Fiskars. The sharpener is not useful. The scissor blades only go in part way and the action is clumsy and I doubt if any sharpening is going on. In any event a partially sharpened blade doesn't help at all. Not worth 1 star but it's a minimum it seems.

I had to take a break from assembling (200 of) these name tags to write this review since this experience has been painful and miserable these are to assemble. The plastic comes sealed so tight that opening them to get the paper tag inserts inside feels nearly impossible and takes SO MUCH TIME. On top of that, because of how difficult the slot is to unseal, my index finger is all cut up and index finger and thumb nails are destroyed now. (Word of advice, put bandaids on your fingers before assembling as a method of protection). The other negative part of this experience was when I realized some of the metal clips are missing or broken/unusable so make sure you order an excess of the number of tags you need in case your clips are missing or broken too. I wouldn’t recommend these as a name tag option. The only reason I didn’t give one-star was because they look nice!

I bought this refurbished in July 2015, and didn't try to use it until Feb. 7, 2016.  It sat in the box by my computer.  When I installed it, the drivers were corrupt / invalid (that's what my computer said).  It wouldn't load them properly from the Neat website, either, giving me the same message.  I spent 2 hours on the phone with a tech from Neat - he was great - tried everything, but it still wouldn't work.  He suggested replacing the USB cord.  I did.  Still doesn't work.  The light won't come on on the mobile scanner.  So...looks like I'm SOL because the warranty on a refurb is only 6 months.  I should have been more diligent to try it immediately upon arrival, which I will do from now on.  I gave it at least 2 stars because I like the software I see online - easy organization.  So, I will probably just shell out for a new one this time.  Grrr.

I am giving a poor review due to the fact that when I print a document, the some colours look like they did not mix well when they were made. The green has a shade of purple in the printed document. I am not happy with this product and would not re-order.

This arrived with a broken frame. I don't think products should be negatively reviewed for shipping issues. The problem I have with this product is that the frame is so light, thin and brittle that almost any handling would damage it.

I really liked this product & with the reviews I said why not let's buy this but when I got my first one the box was somewhat open & then took the pieces out I could see smudges all around so then I decide to return & buy another one that hopefully came new but I just received and sure enough it came actually filthy so I'm returning both of then. I like the product still its just if I wanted a used one I'd buy a used one

Cart was received without a axle making the cart unusable. I contacted HoneyCanDo and they promised a replacement of axle, This cart was originally ordered in April, Axle was promised on 26 April and this is the 8th of April. Never will purchase another product from this 4th rate company.

Lack of a decent template and the necessity of working with Adobe files has caused me to provide a less-than-stellar review.  This was a very "old-school-technology" method of preparing and printing labels.  Providing an Avery Labels-style template makes a lot more sense.
Its funny how that shredder has all those good reviews and it stops working 8days after i bought it. See the pictures below before you buy this crap
The chalky and neon pens keep skipping and dragging. I pleased. I feel duped by the other reviews.

Tried it for 10 days hoping I could use it to help reconcile receipts.  Programs had to be restarted 30 minutes into the initial time scanning.I found the scanner to be slow in scanning.I purchased the portable scanner instead of the desk top scanner after reading the reviews about receipts not scanning straight.It was impossible to get long grocery store receipts to scan straight.I had to check every receipt once it was scanned.  30% had incorrect amounts and had to be corrected.The software seemed limited.  Not a lot of ability to customize reports.I was looking to scan a receipt and have it tallied in Microsoft Excel.  I was hoping this would save me some time reconciling receipts.Maybe in a few more years I will try it again.

Reverse function never worked. Was touted to take up to 8 pages. Put in 4 pages and machine crumpled them together and jammed. Would not star t again. Company offered to replace if I returned defective shredder. I did not keep original packaging so had no way to send back the equipment. Not worth the time and money to repackage and return. I call it a loss!

Doesn't work at 90 degrees (probably the most common angle needed ) and gouges the surrounding trim. Does not stop the door, well I never really let it try either just gently testing the swing range left a gouge in both my trim and the door.I would rate it zero if allowed. I guess they get one star for recognizing a problem even if they are no where near a solution.I fell for the promise of an easy solution but the physics of stopping a swinging  door at the hinge are a real challenge and not likely to be overcome by something small and easy to retrofit.  The door is several feet of lever arm and the ones that cause damage to walls and wear out spring style stops tend to be heavy.
These are faulty pens which are probably old.  they are well reviewed, but ink seems dry and doesn't flow when starting to write.

No stars!  This is a true piece of crap.  The legs consistently fall apart or fling about when you move the item around.  You can't tighten the screws on one end because the drawer compartment is in the way and the screws on the legs on the other end are useless.  I thought from the description and the picture that this is just what I needed.  Wrong!

The ballbearings are coming out of these wheels after less than a month. At the current rate they will be useless before long. Not happy. No where near the weight limit that was suggested on the product page and only used for a couple of hours a day. I think either a manufacturing issue or a poor design.....

I was quite disappointed when I got this.  I thought it would have a slot to hold also pennies.  I was misled by a person giving his review in this section, because the person said it did held pennies.  The description of this unit is not clear.  Another item that will go into my collection of junk pieces.  Not worth getting your money back, it's doesn't cost that much in the first place.For those that are reading this.  It only has three slots.  And it only holds Quarters, Nickles, and Dimes.  Plus the sticky tape it comes with, doesn't hold it when you fill it up with coins.  It will disappoint you.

Hopefully Amazon will let me post this review, whatever their problem seems to be with bad reviews...I had no problem opening the item, but try as I might, once I loaded the staples, there was no way the tray could close with staples on it because it simply wasn't built to accommodate them.Back it went.

I bought these to safely mail DVD's that were not in a case.  I found they were larger than I liked, though I did not see other options at the time I ordered these.  They also seemed too flexible to protect the DVD.  However, I did not test them nor did I send out enough to determine whether I would have a high return rate.  Perhaps they worked OK.  I did not get complaints from the recipients.
Good deal To bad this is no good! WHAT IS GOING ON HERE? I read the reviews an this is crazy. I want my money back

I ordered these labels really excited to dress up my new lip balms that I plan to give as gifts for customers who purchase my soaps. As far as the label is it would be perfect except for their "template". Just like all the other reviews it is extremely difficult to use, took me a day to figure it out. A DAY! Finally when I figured it out I went to print and it print's horizontal not landscape. I'm still working on trying to figure out how to print it the way I want it to appear. The images on Dashleigh make it appear so easy but it is not!

The ink seemed to be a great cheaper alternative and looked fine at first. The printer is not showing ink level low but the ink is leaving splatter marks on my pages. I have taken the ink out and shook it per another review recommendation and it has not helped at all. I won't be ordering from here again because I need what I print to look nice all the time.

2 of 3 CARTRIDGES BAD...  "C" & "Y'".  JUST INSTALLED as I never print color, opting 4 bk only or greyscale on my other printer. Only use this HP8620 for speed and business. was working fine xcept ink was 'low' and constantly have to walk over to print to hit 'black only' bc color inks were out.  Went to print IMPT LEGAL DOCS at 2330, and found 2 cart's BAD...played around with printer [ which WAS working fine previous, as I said] and just wasting more time troubleshooting. PURPOSELY bought BRAND HP to PREVENT problems and have peace of mind... SCAM.  I did also buy an HP 950XL black at same time [ off other vendor and WORKED FINE...  guess will go back to aftermarket and take my chances. THAT way, if I'm sold bogus stuff, it dont hurt so bad financially vs payin 3x-4x price for Proprietary HP cartg's. NOT HAPPY. Have supportive photos of printer screen 4 evidence but too disgusted to deal with this anymore tonight [ or ever] as I HAVE to have documents out BEFORE and with AM mail. Maybe i can add and update review later? SAW i can still return so happy about that. Not gonna just exchange..just gonna do my return at UP{S store and have THEM make my copies while I'm there anyways...TIME is money, verses me using my dinosaur, 2 ppm slow poke back-up printer.  pics show ORig ink levels, then AFTER new CArtg's, THEN I replaced the NEW [bad HP] with orig budget aftrmlt I was using to SHOW and test if HP was actualy bad- yes. The orig "M" aftrmkt cart photo shows low on ink but not defective.  Pic 5 shows NEW HP 'M"cart was fine..and the new/full bogus HP C & Y cartg's.  Tired to reset printer 7x, tuernin off, pullin plug liek screen said, etc etc. Same C&Y cartg display kept coming back. HOpe to get refun. Will buy budget aftrkrt like I had. SCan chips on cartgs looked fine. I would expect this using aftermarket CArtg's..btu not real thing form HP. Funny how printers see and recognize ur using orig HP or not. Didnt pay off for me...fluke or just MY luck-  who's to say?

I usually do not leave reviews, especially negative reviews, however I'm seriously disappointed with this purchase.  These toners leave a streak of color down both sides of the printed page, rendering them useless to me.  I cannot use these printed pages for my presentations and projects. Because I purchased these replacements and couple months ago and am just now starting to use them, I am no longer eligible for a return or exchange. This was 100% a waste of my money and I am completely unsatisfied.  Please do not waste your money like I did.

I very rarely write a poor review; however the LED screen is barely readable.  You must have the unit at a perfect level to view.  It prints very slowly and eats up tapes (as almost all the Brother P Touch Label Makers do).  I received this free of charge so in that it was a better bargain.  I have owned a PT-580c since the late 90s and it is still going strong.  You must wipe off the thermal head with a q-tip and light solution of alcohol periodically.

The stamp arrived on time and looks sturdy. But they printed the details on the stamp incorrectly. I've contacted the seller and will update the review based on their response and remedy for their mess-up.

It took a little longer than some in the reviews for issues but the cartridges have a permanent streak in them eventually that you can do nothing about as it is on the rollers.  Finally had to go ahead and replace with Canon original and true cartridges.  Complete waste of my money.

Terrible product, if I could leave negative stars I would. Ordered one color and one black, they came in the correct boxes but in the black box was a color cartridge, so I ended up with two colors. Now I don't have a black to finish my print job. Will not buy from again.
I was so excited by this concept after years of Erasermates left me crestfallen.  There's no need for a long review...they're junk junk junk junk JUNK. Boo, Pilot...you know better.

New Review:.Mechanism is listing to the right. It has also developed a  horrible, LOUD squeaking noise on that side as well.Will attempt to contact Seller since it as listed as "warranted" to facilitate a replacement.  Will update review accordingly.Original Review (Original Rating was Four Stars).Bought two; will most likely buy another. All holes lined up, tilt mechanism works fine and is adjustable.  The only drawback is the shape mid body (it sits up about 3/8 of an inch higher than the rest of the mechanism body - it is the way it is made).  As result, had to fit washers underneath the chair back attachment (the same  could be achieved with a piece of plywood or similar with holes drilled through).  So far so good.

Buyers BEWARE!!  Hopefully you will read these reviews or pick up on the product description before you make the mistake of ordering this item - the sale is NOT for an entire set of cartridges as the picture would imply, but for a SINGLE CYAN INK CARTRIDGE.The item itself is fine - a genuine HP 02 ink cartridge - but you can buy the same thing for half the price almost anywhere else.

Love Amazon, have been disappointed a few times but figured that was normal.  I bought these “non-slip mats” to try to get some organization around my chair.  As a retiree, I do pretty much everything from my recliner.  Info said it holds 5#.  I put one on the side of the table beside my chair, thought I could put my “power button” there and be able to find it easily, instead of having to search for it.  Stuck for maybe 1/2 hour.  The picture shows my power button.  Definitely not 5#!  Replaced mat, same thing.  They are supposed to be reusable, so I pressed a phone charging cable to it.  Didn’t hold for 5 minutes.The mat feels and looks like a much thicker and hardier material that’s like what your credit card is stuck to the paper with when you get it in the mail.  The mat sticks to the table fine, it just doesn’t hold anything.  Maybe it would if I put it on the top of the table, but that kind of defeats the purpose of “it sticks anywhere.”I’ve read both good and bad reviews, but chose to take the chance.  It wasn’t worth it this time.

The paper is not as vibrant as the picture. The black isn’t as dark and the colors aren’t as bright so the stars don’t pop off the page like the picture. I’m using these as a surprise letter to my students from their parents and I’m disappointed in the print quality. The pack came bent and it’s too late to get a new one before STAAR testing begins.
Garbage.  Thankfully I only ordered this as a joke gift.  I only gave 1 star because I can't give 0.
My printer won’t read the cartridges waste of money I relied on the reviews n I should have listened now I’m out money n ink smh

I rated this earlier mistaking it for another product. A smaller penguin liquid wave paperweight I use in my preschool classroom everyday. This one was made of glass. Huge. And shattered the first day on the floor of my classroom while I was out for a meeting and my aides had the "pleasure" of coraling all 20 of our 3 year olds away from the mess in order to clean it up. It was awesome to look at, before it died. But definitely not for kids!
The green and magenta are star Ink. Yes, I said green. It is supposed to be blue, so I can no longer print blue.

We ordered 2 pink pairs for my granddaughters that are both lefties.Not only did we not get the right color that we ordered. There's nowhere to get customer service. It's a good thing they were cheap they're not worth the time to return them (I have a feeling that's what they're banking on) I hope they work better than the other product reviews say they do. These products are made in China not the USA.
Like other reviewers have mentioned, the key snapped off the first time I used it.
Cute, but disappointed that it turns. I read this in other reviews, but didn't think much of it as I didn't feel it would bother me much, but it did. Never used it.
i can't write a single word without the ink skipping at some point. i was excited to get these pens based on the reviews but they seriously suck! not even worth the five bucks

I have purchased several of these over the years from office supply stores.  This one seems to be made with a little more care.  The axle rod is made of metal in this one (as opposed to plastic in the others)  I'm anxious to see where this is in a few months.*Edit, reduced from 5 stars to 2 stars.  This reduction is because my coworker ordered two more of these for our office.  I sent her the direct link.  We were sent two of the "other" kind, with a plastic axle and flimsier design.  I brought this to the seller's attention, and their response was "those aren't made anymore."This is not "Heavy Duty"  This is light duty at best.

I had been a happy user of this product for many years. I was very surprised when I tried to print some cards with this new batch. The image was dull and lifeless when it used to be bright and vivid. The outcome used to be similar to what I get using the best quality matte photo paper, but now it's more like cheap presentation paper. Very disappointed! Then I looked at the reviews (I hadn't bothered because I was so familiar with the product). and sure enough, the newer ones complained that a change was apparently made and the paper sucks now. Get it together Avery! I returned the remaining product for a refund becaude it was unusable.

I purchased 5 boxes of AmazonBasics Clear Sheet Protectors - Letter Size (100 Pack)I am returning 2 boxes unopened and have used 1 box which contained product in perfect condition.This review is about the two boxes of damaged product that I received. Which I am returning.14/100 Sheets in one of the boxes are damaged and unusable.9/100 Sheets in the other box are damaged and unusable.It is unacceptable to have 10%~ of the product ordered to be damaged and unusable.While I am satisfied with half of my order I rate these protectors 2 stars overall for bad quality control.

Brother J805DW will not accept this ink. Too late to return but given the number of other comments regarding it not working it should not be listed for sale here <- is what I wrote after several attempts to get the machine to accept the cartridges, removing and replacing each one several times plus resetting the printer. Finally, after checking the display one more time and seeing it was erroring on the black cartridge I removed and replaced that one a few times then suddenly it started the cleaning cycle and began printing. Not exactly confidence inspiring - but I raised it from one star to two because at least for now it's working.
I am unable to give a valid review as I buy next set when I put in backup set for next backup set so will not be using it for a while. I will be happy to give a review at that time.

Toner doesnt work in an updated printer, i had to remove the chip from my old cartridge and transplant in the aftermarket cartridge to get the printer to detect it. Once that was done it gives good print quality.I have since been contacted multiple times by the seller for a refund if I take my review down. Shady business...

This tape seemed to have positive reviews, but I received mine today and can't use it for my moving boxes. Can't get one whole piece of tape off the roll without it splintering into several pieces. I do not recommend this tape.
Sorry to say these were awful. I have no idea why they got so many good reviews. They had to be shaken to even work at times. Very sporadic behavior. Maybe ok for writing but not coloring.

I bought these for my kids to use on the white board. They are very light and nothing like shown in the product detail photo or other reviewers photos. They are dull and looks like we got a defective batch. There is no option to return the markers or replace them.

Looks pretty, but beware of the spiral-binding - I immediately noticed that it "sticks" every time I try to open or close the cover.  The pages turn just fine, but the cover - which is a very nice soft suede-like material, is thick but flexible enough that it will kind of grab the spiral rings if you are not careful.  It sounds like nothing, because of course you can work around it, but it is super-annoying if you don't want to keep it open all day.Another problem with the spiral binding, IF you keep it open all the way, is that it sticks up pretty high, and if you are right-handed it will get in the way of you writing on anything close to the middle of the page (in this case Tuesdays and Saturdays).  I imagine that for southpaws this problem won't rear its head until around March.Maybe the design is meant to be used so that the cover is folded open back on itself?  Sounds good, but it sticks that way, too, and when you have it open to one page you don't get to see the whole week, as the left page has Mon, Tues, Fri, and Sat, and the right page has Wed, THurs, Sun, and Notes.  As such, you can't get a full picture of the week without keeping it wide open.A huge missing feature is some sort of built-in bookmark, or other way of easily going to the current week/day.  It needs a ribbon, or some sort of tear-off corner perforation.  Otherwise, you have to search for it using the monthly tabs, but every moth is at least 5 pages and it seems like extra work.Major holidays are listed in the back and printed on the dates, but right off the bat I noticed they left off nationally observed holidays. - notably Friday July 3rd, when offices are closed for the long weekend.  I don't know what other ones are missing, but it doesn't give me confidence that this planner will give me a heads-up when I need one.Just now, when I went to take a last look at the cover of the book for this review, it stuck on the spiral rings four or five times before i could actually close the book!  Ugh - I guess I'm glad I got it for free, but I think I'm still in the market for a new desk planner.

I would think it would be difficult to make a dull, serrated letter opener, but they did it!  Even if it was $2 it would be over charging for something that works marginally well at best...  I've had a bunch of these over the past 30+ years I've worked in business offices, but this one always surprises me how it rips, tears, but doesn't "cut" the fold of the envelope, even when you "saw" it back and forth.  I gave it two stars because it didn't bend, break, or come apart when in use; but I wish it would have fallen apart so I could return it....

As many other reviewers have noted, this safe is not the proper place for documents. Any 8.5 by 11 sheet will curl up on the long  axis.  I had about 30 sheet of conventional sized paper documents in it and could barely close the lid without catching the documents in the seal area.Most plastic formed parts have what is called draft on their sides. This is a slight taper that enables the part to be easily ejected from its mold. More than likely , this safe's measurements are taken at the top or open end and taper to undersized for conventional paper sheet at the bottom.Returned it.

I gave them 2 stars because they did deliver package promptly & securely. However, black ink cartridges did not last one third as long as specified (even using the economy mode on my printer). I would not order them again. I haven't used the color cartridge yet, so I am still hopeful...

At first, these seemed like a huge upgrade - they rolled easier and were quieter and I felt they were much safer on my wood floors.  Of note though, these are taller than your average wheel, so if you are on the shorter side, you may not be able to get your chair low enough after installing these.  I'm pretty tall so it wasn't really an issue - and I have a height adjustable desk, so I was able to easily adjust everything to fit.The reason for the review is I have had these for 19 months - and a few weeks ago, I started noticing grease on my carpet and getting on my socks (I work from home, no shoes) then I started finding little ball bearings on the carpet.  Now the wheels get stuck a lot and don't turn, and I'm here searching for a better brand.They seemed great while they lasted, but I'm disappointed they have completely failed already.

I was hesitant to purchase this after reading some of the reviews but went ahead anyway, hoping for the best. I am returning it. It has the look of plastic and the wording was crooked and poorly applied. Definitely looked cheap. In fact, who ever was packing the box either didn't take time to inspect the product before packing it or didn't care that they were sending a defective item. Also the dimensions listed for size are way off.
Be wary like other reviewers—the one time I didn’t read reviews first. You only receive 1 box for $17; that’s it. Just one.

Purchased on 1/30/16. They arrived quickly enough and were easy to install. After about 10 months, one of them developed a 1" split on the inside top edge which has now grown to be about 3" long. I don't see how to contact the seller to get a replacement so I'll post this review. See the attached photo.

I bought these to carry with me through my work day. They fit well in a pocket but the erasers do not want to stay in and I lose any loose lead that's in my pencil as a result.  One of the pencils (the red one) somehow came apart and was rendered unusable within a day . I wouldn't recommend these for pockets. On a side note not effecting my rating: they do not hold up to kids either (though that wasn't the intended use, I work with kids who see weird pencils and happily swipe them to try them out!)

My printer, a high end HP Inkjet, had a lot of problems with these.  The center label would come loose and jam the printer frequently.  I lost 28% of the sheets to jams including one where the label came completely off the backing and wrapped itself around a roll in the printer.On the plus side, they are easy to write on and ink from a pen dried and did not smudge.If they had fed thru the printer without problems I would have given these 5 stars.And FYI, I have had very few jams with this printer on other media including full letter size sheet sized Avery labels.

Good journal. Easy to use. I like the weekly recap, review the week and celebrate wins and other areas that need improving.Would appreciate it if allows one to capture events of a full day (24hrs).The appearance of the journal after first sight was a little disappointing. The colour is a bit dull & doesn’t appear new.

What a shame. They just won't stay on after a good washing. Really was looking forward to them. But...had to return.UPDATE: I just found out that the seller, LOLLIPOP LABELS, is expecting ME to pay for return postage and shipping. Not gonna happen. Is there a way to vote less than one star for the seller?

I bought this product for my 17 inch laptop.  Days after buying it, the legs collapsed and my PC hit the floor damaging the screen.  I thought was secure but it turns out you have to really get make sure the legs are pushed in tight.  I also had a problem with the battery back popping off.Also, it is too heavy. I rarely use it and instead not use a basic $10 breakfast tray.  I agree with another reviewer that it was a great idea but poorly executed.

I read the reviews and saw several people mention that theirs arrived broken, but I rolled the dice because it was so cheap. Sure enough, mine was broken in mutliple places. I was able to glue it together somewhat and I do use it. It is Ok on a table, but very delicate for couch or bed.
These markers are NOT dry erase!!!! False advertising!! I wish I would have read all of these reviews before buying! Don’t make the same mistake as me! If you want dry erase go elsewhere.
Does not stick. Should have listened to the other reviews. Do not waste your time or money.

I purchased this printer to replace my 5-6 year old HP OfficeJet Pro 8500 a909a - the HP has worked great, but has had episodes requiring prolonged alignments/cleanings, and I felt that it was time for an upgrade. WF-5690 received great Consumer Reports reviews.My issue (see attachments) - fine but noticeable yellow horizontal banding. This does NOT occur on my old OfficeJet Pro 8500 a909a. This is using the highest print quality possible on both ("Quality" on WF-5690 using Mac print settings or farthest to the right on Other... using Windows settings; High Speed Printing turned off).Steps that I have tried to remedy:1. Upgrade to latest firmware GC07G4 29.DE2. Perform Print Head Alignment multiple times both from Mac and Windows computers (both for Photo and Text printing), as well as from the printer LCD control panel3. The Improve Horizontal Streaks feature in the Maintenance section of the LCD panel, which seemed to have no effect despite changing to the minimal (-10) and maximal (+10) settings4. Additionally, I have done multiple nozzle checks followed by head cleaningsUnfortunately, these horizontal lines are there to stay.I plan to contact Epson technical support, and will update my rating if the problem is fixed.

I received this sharpener today and have already boxed it up to return. It does not sharpen #2 graphite pencils well. It is off center, with only one side sharpening and rotating the pencil while sharpening didn't help. I ran a couple of dozen pencils through with pretty consistently poor results.I think that those who have given this a good review had a good product. It just seems to be a gamble, as there appears to be little or no quality control on things made in China. If you get a good one, you are fortunate.I do appreciate Amazon's no hassle return policy because I wouldn't buy anything on line without it.

I trusted the good reviews and even Amazon's Choice seal of approval and ordered this.  The colors are dull and the fine liner did not last long.  The tip gets bent after just a few uses and the ink dried out.  Not worth the money.  Pay more for something better.
Don't waste your money, this piece of crap does not work. Took the suggestions of some of the reviews, that didn't work either. Spend a little more and buy the original toner.
item does not work.  Very poor quality.  Don't sure why it is not returnable if it does work???  Amazon should review. All messages about this product

I should have read the reviews before I purchased. The case does not stay closed, very cheap product. Also didn't realize I was not getting the blue one pictured and a pink one showed up for my son. I will be returning.

I absolutely loved my first one and used it for years.  I knocked it off my desk one too many times and had to replace it.  Saw a lot of bad reviews and tried a Brother, but wasn't happy with it.  I went back and bought another NeatReceipts and kept having trouble with it.  Customer service initially responded and I got it to working again after the 1st time or two, but then they totally ignored me.  One year warranty, my eye.  You just try and collect.

I do not write reviews, but I'm writing one for this pen because of how terrible it is. Don't get me wrong these pens write very well, however after only a few days of using one of the pens the cap didn't want to stay on tight. It was so loose that I could hold the pen by the cap and it would fall out of the cap. I said whatever and tried a second pen; this one did the same thing. Well here I am now with 12 pens that are still pretty full, but the caps do not stay on. I wish I could use these because they do look cool and write well (the reason I'm not giving it 1 star), however I can't just hold onto a bunch of pens without caps.

The media could not be loaded.                      Seemed like a great deal at first. Cartridge was easy to install, and recognized by the printer without a problem. Once I printed a test page (see video), I immediately noticed that the toner didn’t fuse properly to the paper. It literally rubs off with a light touch of your finger. Just to make sure it wasn’t a printer issue, I reinstalled the old original OEM cartridge to get a fresh print, and had no issues with the output at all. I only installed the black cartridge from this set, but I imagine the same will happen with the other colors. I am just glad I had to replace a cartridge while still within the return policy.Update: Seller reached out and apologized for the faulty cartridges, blaming it on a Quality Control issues  They have made an effort to correct and resolve the issue. Upping my rating to 3 stars to reflect the level of customer service.

Customer service line is staffed 7 a.m. - 5 p.m. PST. Sorry, I'm not calling at your convenience because you failed to QA your product. And if they can't even include the keys in many of the boxes, I'm not sure I really trust that the rest of their manufacturing process is working (and therefore that this box is really 1 hour water/fireproof.Based on another reviewer's experience I am going to just send this directly back to Amazon and not even deal with them.This is also WAY heavier than I expected. I would have kept it, but thought that would be helpful for others to know.

This was terrible! I got it and used it to print things for school and it wouldn’t give me color so I tried again and one again a blank piece of paper came out, I read so many reviews and I don’t know how some people liked it or it worked for them but I personally don’t recommend it.
I unfortunately can't give a true rating of this product as I ended up with an empty package and they were not able to provide me a replacement.

I guess I drew a short straw :( Most of the review have been good so I figured any bad reviews must have been isolated issues. So I purchased this in October of 2017. I use my printer about once a week and it shows I should have plenty of toner available, however everything I print is faded and basically unreadable and definitely unusable. Disappointing since the price is great and at first prints turned out great, but the life of this product does not meet up to the claims at all.

Well, what can I say, it's the first bad review I've given for a 3M product.The rolls of tape inside these are 300 inches, which means they are much less than the standard 450 inches.On top of that, they are not so simple to use.  One has to pull out the white tab, to which the tape is stuck, then pull the tape free from the tab.  After that, it's pull and tear as before.Before you fold the white tab back in to close the dispenser, you have to make sure the tape is tucked down against the tab, or it could fold stick-side in, which is no good.All in all, a poor design.  perhaps they can redesign it so one doesn't have to mess with a tab, or ensure that the tape is tucked a certain way upon closing, but until then, I'll be sticking with the standard dispenser.Keep in mind, the tape (apart from being shorter than normal) is just fine.  It's the dispenser that's sub-par.

Another reviewer posted the same thing. This is NOT AT ALL transparent pink like the photo. As you can see here, I already have a blue transparent one, and I love it. I wanted a pink one like it, but this is NOT what I wanted. I give it 2 stars at least, because it does work, but this thing is not worth the trouble to send back. It's a stapler, and it works, so there's that.

Do not even think of buying this. I tried 2 different units. The scanner didn't work on the first one so I sent it back for another.  On that one the software would not install.  Absolutely no customer service from neat.  Even their web site to ask for assistance has no submit button.  I should have paid attention to other reviews.  If I could give it no stars I would.  I'm going to try a brother scanner and hope for bettering luck
I am very disappointed! I did not receive any of the mochi squishies. When and if I recieve them, I will update my review. Other than that this set is nice. Just really wish I had the squishies : (
WARNING As you can see on the other reviews. My pack was also MISSING 2 pieces. DO NOT BUY THIS product if you are looking to waste your time returning.
Doesn't work unfortunately.  Gave it 2 stars for the false sense of security it provides me and for the fact that I can use it as a bat when an intruder breaks in through the other door lock.

I had high hopes for this after reading several reviews but I would suggest avoiding it at all costs.  This printer has been nothing but trouble in the few months we have had it.  Our previous all-in-one was another brand that lasted 7 years without any trouble at all.  But this thing... I have to fix it weekly.  It regularly has errors with paper jams and paper feed that cannot be fixed but simply clearing the jam.  I have had to reinstall firmware to get it to reset from a cleared paper jam, and have had to reset to factory several times to fix paper feed errors.  It and has finally died after only 8 months(which I am actually happy about so I dont have to fight with it anymore).  Awful.  Our office will not be buying another Epson printer.

I'm not one to give bad reviews... however this stapler is not good! It is extremely hard to open. I opened it once to load it with staples and it then would not shut. Eventually it ended up breaking. I had it for a total of an hour and it fell apart, and I was pretty gentle with it.Don't buy this product. I mean possibly I could have gotten a defective one however I was supper disappointed.

Kay, I know my review is going to be seen as a bit harsh, and to be fair it IS but... this calculator cost me about $180 and for all of it's capabilities and their utility to me. I may as well have bought a $40-60, or used my computer.I am in a hard statistics class, and an equally difficult engineering class. One day I had discovered that I had lost the TI-92 I had bought years ago in high-school. I loved my TI-92 and it had proven useful well into college. I bought this because I had thought it was the most advanced calculator that TI had offered, and I had a test that day and NEEDED something to use to check my math. I expected it to have all of the functionality of my TI-92 at the very minimum.I was happy to discover that I no longer needed to use the TI-92's unnatural grammar to perform integrals, and sigma additions. (With all of the , separating clauses) Then I attempted to do a definite intigral between two numbers, and hit enter."Unsupported on this calculator. Buy TI-nspire CAS"I cussed, then I flipped through the options, and chose indefinite intigral, figuring I could calculate it myself."Unsupported on this calculator"I threw the calculator down on my desk with enough force to draw the attention of the TA who was giving the test. Honestly, the durability of the thing surprised me, it did not break.After a quick explanation as to the source of my behavior, the TA decided, fortunately, NOT to throw me out of the test. I continued the test, solving the integrals by hand, unlike any other student in the test, who were all equipped with the 'class recommended' TI-89. I ran out of time with a third of the questions unsolved.I'd return it, but the box is opened, and I don't have the receipt.Thanks TI! Thanks to you I only scored 61.2% on a test that I could have probably gotten about 90% on had I had a proper calculator that could do everything your more primitive models could do! Maybe you should include the fact that it's been bricked/crippled in the packaging PLEASE?DO NOT USE THIS if you need integral support!

I did like the built quality of the ink cartridges. They fit perfect in the printer head. Howevwr, didn't work for me, instead spoiled the print head. Had to order a new print head as a result. Beware if you decide to buy this ink it may ruin your printer head. I don't like giving a low rating but unfortunately in this case I have no choice but to do so.

We purchased these chairs and even though we read several reviews on how durable and sturdy these chairs were, they are not sturdy at all. Very annoyed and frustrated as we purchased 20 of these chairs and so far 7 have broke. The weight limit was what sold us on these chairs in the first place, but in no way are these chairs trustworthy to hold even 200 lbs, no where near the max limit of 800 lbs as described. I would strongly suggest that consumers not purchase these chairs.

The number of Lanyards received in the package ws only 88, not the 100 advertised. The item is short packed by over 10%!!!!I expected them to be low quality like the other reviews have posted, but did not expect to be scammed on the quantity.

The armrest covers arrived on time and they fit my chairs armrest; so I give two stars for that. However the foam was quite hard and only aggravated the painful discomfort on my forearms. I removed them and swapped them for another set that had half the foam but softer foam. I can't recommend these armrest covers to anyone that is looking for a nice soft foam armrest.
Of course, Post-it Notes are fantastic.  But I went to the Dollar Star and found these at a much cheaper price, albeit only in one color.  That didn't bother me at all.

Well, taking it out of the packaging, part of it at the bottom comes out in my hand... Breaks after 2 seconds... I tried to glue it back using Gorilla Glue, no luck... I check on the rest of it, the adjacent part breaks too.... Well.... Maybe this one was damaged in storage.Oh well, it now rests in my recycle bin as it cannot be returned and I can't find a way to contact the seller.Others wrote good reviews. If you're buying this, I wish your luck is better than mine :)
I should have trusted the reviews that said it doesn't work.

If I could give no stars, I would! Waste of money for product that is useless. It will not even hold a light tin ornament, let alone a less-than-5lb picture. Tried on multiple surfaces with multiple items. Very disappointing.

I had previously purchased two rotring pro pencils (in matte black) that I REALLY liked, but that my youngest daughter managed to lose (both...such is life). As I'm currently taking a math course I decided to splurge on the rotring 800 (silver) because the previous rotring pros were so comfortable to use even for long periods of time (I also explicitly tell my youngest that she's not to draw using THIS one). I have purchased two of rotring 800s, the first arrived last week Monday, and the second pencil arrived yesterday afternoon. Within days of receiving the first I noticed I was constantly having to screw the components of the pencil back together, and by Thursday the feeder mechanism stopped working. I liked the look & feel of the pencil (when it wasn't coming undone), so I ordered a replacement thinking maybe that one was a dud. The replacement arrived Sunday 27 Sep, and instead of working on my math homework this morning, I'm writing this review, because within minutes of starting my work, the pencil came and kept coming undone. I was tempted to put loctite on the threads, but I didn't think the seller would accept a return if I did. I shouldn't have to use loctite to keep my pencil from falling apart in my hand. I feel like a Scooby-doo villain chasing Scoob and the gang through multiple doors in a haunted mansion. When I go to sharpen the lead, the tube/feeder mechanism twists out, when I twist that in, the portion (is it called a nib?) holding the tube/feeder comes unscrewed. When all else fails the midsection comes unscrewed. I got better stuff to do.

This is falsely advertised as a genuine Epson Bulb but is not.  The Epson bulbs are high quality while the knockoffs are terrible.  I ordered this bulb and realized as soon as I got it that it wasn't the genuine Epson bulb and sent it back.  Now that I have been reimbursed monetarily,but not for the time that I wasted purchasing then returning this bulb,  I am writing this review with a complaint to the BBB about both the vendor and Amazon to shortly follow.Amazon needs to do a better job of vetting their vendors...

Just to cut to the chase, I filled this coin holder with coins, put the hook / loop fastner tape on it, placed it in the car and it came apart before the first use.  Yes indeedy, after I retrieve all the now loose coins from my car, I guess I'll try to superglue or JB Weld it back together and tape it as one reviewer suggests, but why waste your time; just don't buy it in the first place.  Sort of feeling ripped off.  Definitely not fit for purpose.

I just looked at the total number of stars in the reviews not reading the bad reviews. I used this gun for one strip of plastic taggers then like others have stated I was unable to load any more. I even changed out the needle and used a flashlight to watch, you should just push one into the needle  , and it should push it out.it literally just stopped working. It sucks because I'm in the middle of a project for consignment and now I have to figure out another way to get tags on my items . It is a simple concept but made of plastic pieces I can see how it didn't last very long. Extremely disappointed that this item is not eligible for return. What a rip off I understand most people have good experiences with every product there are defects and returns should be eligible.
All three were damaged when shipped, I should have read reviews.  Merchant needs better way to ship 60 dollars in frames.No thanks on these ones

I've bought four or five packages of these labels. When I first started buying them the back of the labels had yellow happy faces and worked fantastic. Now the back has orange faces and the papers are constantly jamming in my printer. I have to load one page at a time in order to print. When you have to print over two thousand labels each summer, loading them one page at a time isnt worth the hassle. I've tried loading and printing two pages but they both get pulled into the printer and have to be thrown out. I dont know what they changed but these arent worth buying anymore. I have two unopened packagess that I'll never use.This wonderful product went from 5 stars down to 2 stars. Its a shame.
Very dissatisfied with SuperSticky.  Maybe I got some from an old batch.  However, 3M would not respond to my complaint, so why a 1-star rating.
The box was what I expected but did not get a lid for it. Would have love to have given a better review.

The color cartridge leaves bars every 1/4 inch or so where it doesn't print.  Only the magenta color but the cartridge is essentially unusable.  Cleaning, deep cleaning, and cleaning the contacts on the cartridge didn't improve the print quality.  Not recommended.  You're really rolling the dice.Update 3/16/20:  Six months after review the vendor refunded the cost of the cartridges (although it took them 3 tries), and asked for the review to be removed.  I won't remove it, but here's the update.  Still don't recommend their cartridges, although the problems seem to be concentrated in the color cartridges.  Raised rating from one star to two.
Misleading description. "1104 Legal Size UL Rated" does not actually hold legal sized documents.

These will not wipe clean off a dry erase white board. You have to use a wet cloth, which means they are technically NOT dry erase markers. Just washable markers. Save yourself the extra $10 and 2 weeks shipping time and just buy the washable markers. I'd give this 0/5 stars If I could as it's misleading over priced product. Junk 0/5

I bought this because the reviews were pretty good. It fits my printer fine, however it's a terrible quality replacement. Don't waste your money on this. It's only been in use for 2 weeks and it's running out. I only use this printer for home use. I had the toner that came with it for almost a year.

Updating this just to say that the software is getting worse not better.  It is possible that I expect too much.  Like the ability to scanreceipts, and use the data to do taxes, export into PDF's for expense reports for work etc.  If this is the flag ship receipt processorthan this bar isn't just laying on the ground it was compressed flat.  Now the software won't even export information correctly or itcompletely crashes the software at random time.  At some point you have to cut the cord.  Time to cut mine.  Has to be better as therecertainly can't be worse.------------ Old Review ---------------Scanner is typically functional.  Under the versions prior to 4 it was actually quite reliable.  This new software is a special kind of awful.  There was once a day when I would tout the Neat software to anyone who would listen.  If you traveled for a living.  I talked to you about how great it was.  Sadly those days are past.  This software is now terrible. I wouldn't recommend someone I hated use it.  But as all things American these days it looks darn good doing nothing well.  The latest I got back from support is the reason I can't export files is because Mozy is on????  What???  So a software I can't turn off due to the fact that it is controlled by our network admins has to be off in order for Neat 5.7 to save a file.  Insane,  If I turn the sync on it collapses the program but I can only get support for the software if I get the monthly subscription so I did.  After about 30 seconds of being on I get the ever helpful Neat has stopped working.  Which I saw twice in the previous 8 years of using the software but now see EVERY SINGLE TIME I launch the program.  My receipt processing time has tripled using this software.  They managed to turn a great software into a pile of rubbish.  One wouldn't think this is an easy feat.  I stand corrected.
I have no issues with the pen but the 1 star is for Amazon. It was supposed to be a 12 count and I received 1 pen in a large box. :(
