The 8570 prints gorgeous pictures, but when it breaks, it breaks permanently. We have gone through five 8570’s over the past 4 years, with each of them experiencing what I would consider low to moderate print volume. Before these 8570’s we went through several 8550’s which are basically the same printer, all with the same type of unrepairable mechanical failures. These solid ink printers are a reliability nightmare with their only saving grace being that fantastic print quality.I’m finally writing this review because I just had to decommission yet another broken 8570 (this one was 3 years and 2 months old), and I replaced it instead with a HP Color Laserjet that is more reliable and with cheaper supplies - even though the prints don’t look as good as the 8570.Most of our 8570’s end up dying after 3 years with a Print Head failure. We tried to repair them the first couple of times that they died, just to find out the cost of the repair exceeds the cost of a new printer by a few hundred dollars. So we bought new printers and trashed the old ones as they died off.Why keep buying printers that break so often? The artists love the print quality, and the ink is useless to any other device and an investment in it’s own right. Colors are vibrant, lines are sharp, they’re fairly easy to network, and they work fine on Macs and PCs. They weigh a ton but they’re not very loud. Even though it costs about $250 to get a full ink supply – yes, close to half the price of the printer - the ink does seem to last a while although it has a tendency to melt itself needlessly (as part of it’s cleaning process) if you don’t use the printer for extended periods of time.That’s the main reason we’ve kept replacing them with new 8570’s. It’s so wasteful but you’re stuck with the supplies and the clients love the prints.Ink is ridiculously expensive and difficult to find, so if you run out you can’t stop by your neighborhood Office Max to grab more. You basically always have to mail order ink. Generally, the 8570’s day to day reliability is fine. It doesn’t randomly reboot itself, it wakes up from sleep mode quickly, and has a web interface to change it’s settings.Just be aware that when it develops a hardware problem, it leaves you dead in the water and there’s no way to repair it without throwing good money after bad. Maintenance Kit is about $110 and you’ll need to get at least one before your printer dies in the next three years.We have only a couple 8570’s left in the office and with luck, we’ll get through enough of that expensive ink before those remaining printers die. We will not be purchasing any more ColorQubes and are basically just waiting for the remaining ones to die off, which at this rate will be a few months after their factory warranty expires.

The other reviewers were right - the pens fall off the caps before I even get to use the pens! The ball-chain clasps are nice and tight, but without the pens, what's the use? Also, yes, all inks are black. Don't waste your money.

I originally gave these pencils 4 stars. After using at least 10 of them, I am reducing g the rating to 2 stars.  The lead inside is broken, so when you sharpen, pieces of it come out causing you to have to sharpen sometimes a quarter inch of pencil to get a new point.  Every pencil has this issue.  Despite this, they write well when the lead is sturdy. Other issue is the end with white plastic requires my electric heavy duty pencil sharpener to get past the plastic.  Sharpen easier once past the 1st inch.  Eraser is great! Would rate much higher if so much lead wasn’t wasted.

So here is the real deal. All the bad reviews are because the product is fake. The one on the left is an actual Xacto. The one on the right is a cheap knock off. The blade holder on the authentic one keeps the blade lined up on the sliding mechinism. So when you tighten it down the blade stays locked in the correct orientation. The parts are all different in small ways, but the difference is a great product vs a cheap one that isn't even useable. It's sloppy, loose, and the blade ends up pointing sideways in the handle once tightened. If you look closely all the parts are slightly different. It comes in near perfect packaging too. So if you've never had the real one, you'd think xacto just made a piece of junk. The real one is awesome. I've had 50 different handles for craft knives in the last 40+ years. If you can get the real one, do. This one isn't it.
These pens are awful.. most of them don't work.. I wouldn't give it even one star but it asks for a rating....0000

I'm extremely disappointed with this product. I read the first review that answered the question I had, it was wrong, and now i have a paper weight. I'm not paying shipping to send it back."Q: Does this come with contact info cards that you can write on or is this strictly a business card holder?Answer this questionA: It comes w/plain while lightweight paper cards wrapped w/ plastic sleeves. You can either slip business cards in between paper & sleeve or write on paper and protect w/sleeve see less"Real answer "no. You have to order custom card slots to insert business cards. There's no point in ordering a higher card count to slip business cards in this stock unit knowing that."I'm not even satisfied with the less than typing paper weight of the stock blank inserts.

I do not recommend this product because of a few reasons. I bought this to help me in and out of bed yet it scare me to use it. Half the time when I try to use it to get into bed or get out of bed the stool will collapse on my. Another issue I found is that it sounds like is going to break any minute and I see the sides start to fold in some times when I hear the noises. This product is rated for 300 lbs and I am only 268 lbs so it should not be behaving this way unless the 300 lbs rating is a lie but I am unable to prove it will hold 300 lbs because I do not want to break it until I find another solution and more sturdier stool.As comparison my wife has a stool in the kitchen that she purchased many years ago, same style and also made of plastic like this one ans that one never makes any noises like is going to break and that one has never collapsed on me while trying to use it.one last note I had this device for a few months I really waited to review so I did it justice and made sure it was not just me being picky.

Didn't work in my printer. It let me have hope for the minutes it took to try and calibrate my printer head. Granted, I have an older printer- two actually. One the newer version that had wifi so my dad bought it for me. Two great Kodak printers that have been used maybe 10 times each. I saw this deal and said oh yeah! Here's my money!!! I received the ink quickly- totally will give the seller that. But, didn't have use for the ink until last week when I was trying to print the Christmas pictures. The printer frankly loaded with one of each type. Black and color. The printer tried to start and when I asked it to calibrate it said it didn't recognize the cartridge. Lesson learned. Just go spend the 40 on Kodak ink or load these cartridges immediately and test them out. It's been so long since the purchase I have no clue if a refund or replacement is possible. Just be careful. For me this was a loss. A deal to good indeed. One star because a sad face with a tear isnt available. 😢
I would write a review on these pens but it seems whoever was supposed to send them to me cannot tell the difference between golf tees and pens....

The yellow ink cartridge does not seem to be working - all my color prints are coming out in shades of pink, blue, and purple, no yellow or any color that needs yellow ink to show. I see from the reviews that others have experienced the same difficulty.

This product does not work. I should have read the reviews. its one job is to hold a piece of lead and hold a needle tips, and it cant do either. I like the metal frame and the spinner, but whoever designed the mechanism to hold the tips needs a new job. DOES NOT WORK. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Seriously???? Bad product. (Dirty and scratching paper)Do not believe about good reviews.
We bought two of these - both died within two months.  I am surprised by the high rating this junk is getting on Amazon.

This replacement cartridge did not work after multiple attempts, even tried tricks and tips suggested by different reviewers here. Product does not come any useful instructions to speak of. Money wasted.
Disappointed in the paper. Should have listened to the other reviews. But you live and learn a guess.

I always order the HP cartridges but took a chance on these based on positive reviews.  I installed one of the cartridges a couple of days ago and my printer recognized it as a used cartridge, but it worked fine - for a couple of copies.  Today as I settle in to work on taxes, I tried to make a copy and to my surprise and annoyance, the page is completely white... it didn't even fade out like the HP cartridges will do.  There is simply nothing.  Now I must drive to get a new cartridge so that I can complete this task.  I'll gladly pay extra for the dependable brand name from now on.  Lesson learned.

IF I could give less than one star I would.  The graphs area great size and highly visible from the seats in my classroom.  Unfortunately, the graphs do NOT stick to any surface.  They fell off my whiteboards and they fell off a window (just checking if they'd stick to anything).  Extremely disappointed.  They are going back!
Terrible product. Leaves multiple dots and streaks on paper. Both of them are bad. Don't believe these reviews anymore

It connected and worked for the first month and then would never connect again. I am disappointed because it had a lot of good reviews. Bottom line is this printer will NOT connect to wifi and will therefore it will not allow you to print.

So far no good. I’m only on the white. Read the instructions on the box to make sure I primed the pen correctly the first time using. Capped it, shook it, and went to press the nib down to saturate the point on a piece of scrap paper. Paint blob came pouring out. Thank goodness I didn’t go right to the rock. Learned my lesson the hard way. I tried doing what another reviewer did by dipping nib in puddle of paint and using that but it doesn’t hold on to any paint - maybe one little drop and then it is dry. I will move on to another color and update review if the others are any better. Happy crafting ❤️

I was so excited when I first got these cartridges. I even signed up for automatic renewal, and have an entire unopened box of 4 cartridges. When I first installed the cartridges, they worked great. Then they started streaking, then Epson updated the software and now my printer does not recognize the 2 cartridges i installed from this manufacturer. I'm sure they didn't know that Epson was going to change their software, but they did and now i have 2 boxes of imitation 288's  that my printer won't use. So frustrating. I initially gave rave reviews for these cartridges....but now I've wasted my money.  So disappointed.  :-(

This price tag gun is okay - it works.  My complaint with it is that the needle part is quite large and consequently leaves quite a whole in the clothes.  Now if you can put it on the tag of a shirt or something it is fine, but a thin fabric or anything like that and it is an issue.  Since I feel that that was a majority of what I needed to tag I am giving it two stars instead of 3.

Love all the contents aligned with HPH book. It is WAY bigger than I’d realized. Much too large to tuck in my purse like I’d planned.Also, the verbiage on Weekly Review pages bothers me. It is a “weekly review” yet every question refers to how “today” went. So is it a once a week assessment or how we felt overall for the week. Considering it took “3 years” to design the planner you’d think this would be more clear.

Box product came in was cracked opened, two of my pens were broke.  The ink leaks.  If you do allot of coloring the ink runs out very quickly.  The colors are awesome and the pens color nicely.  If my product wasn't broken I would have given higher stars

Buyers please beware.... DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.. Amazon should be ashamed of themselves for selling this crap and not allowing customers a refund. The product is not a permanent maker and smears like crazy. Spend your money on a cup of coffee or something else instead of giving it to Jeff Bezos for this crap... Truly the worst product I have ever purchased from Amazon. I wish zero star rating was an option, that's what the product deserves.
The wheels don't align. Feels like my laptop will fall if moved slightly. Not sure how they missed this important feature. I should have read the negative reviews.

Seemed like a nice product based on reviews, the wheels felt solid, but after six weeks one of the wheels lost its bearings, and a couple are slightly tilted. I blame the problem in part on the fact that my chair sets on carpet, combined with the rubberized wheel a lot of horizontal force is applied when I move the chair.I previously used a different style of wheel (amazon product code - B00CIUOVPU) and that worked.  When I purchased a new chair I decided to try this product out, but I now see that I should have stuck with the other type of chair casters.I can not recommend this product based on my experience.

These cartridges are horrible. Out of 4 black cartridges, I was able to use ONE and the darkness of the black stinks. The others couldn't even be recognized By the printer. I have had replacement cartridges before that were excellent but these are pure throw aways and I am surprised Amazon still permits this seller to be on their site!!!!! My daughter loves Hot Dots, but the pens never last and they never work! We have bought several different pens and they always give the incorrect answer. We have tried calling customer service and kept buying new pens, changing the batteries, and they worked for a few times and then right back to where we started. I would give 5 stars if the pens actually worked.

2 pack - one good cartridge, one bad cartridge; 50% failure. Opened support request on supplier website for replacement. Awaiting acknowledgement and confirmation of intent to replace.~~~~~~~~~~~UPDATE: 20200410 - Upgraded rating from 1 star to 2 stars. Vendor quickly responded to customer support contact and replaced bad cartridge.

I don't know how this could possibly have a positive review.  I bought these ink cartridges because the COVID-19 pandemic has forced me to do school from home.  I have had to print a few things off for class, and I have successfully printed off less than 30 pages of work.  All of a sudden now I cannot print anymore pages.  All 4 ink cartridges are stated as having ink in them.  I can shake the black ink cartridge and hear ink still inside of it.  I have not even used the color ink in my printer!  Yet for some reason it will not print ANYTHING.  Now here I am, without a printer for classes and stuck with having to decide what to do with a 25 lb paper weight.

We purchased a number of these 20 pack Assorted Color Plastic Clothes Pins in May of 2014.  Within 4 months, over 90% of these clothes pins cracked and fell to the ground.  I purchased these clothes pins after reading all the glowing reviews.  Not sure how or why, but the large majority of these clothes pins cracked and became utterly useless within 4 months.We have chosen to go back to the reliable wood clothes pins.  These plastic clothes pins are easily destroyed by the sun's UV rays.  We usually average about 3-5 years of usage with the wooden clothes pins.  I will never purchase this brand of plastic clothes pins ever again.
Advertised a the larger size and I got pocket size. There are several reviews with same issue . Misrepresented and I am returning mine!!!!!
Might be good for someone, but for me it turned out to be useless :(So as I often use others reviews before I buy - I review it as it was applied to my experience

This is the worst product I have ever bought on Amazon.  Not sure why they even allow this company to operate on this site, and how can those reviews be real.  Have to be fake based on how the product works.  Now I might have to replace all my Ink and possibly printer as well.  Copies come out half printed, printer stops working and there is ink mess everywhere.  Bad stuff.  Worst ink purchase ever.

The blank ink cartridge I purchased does not work. I installed it into my printer and now I am receiving errors saying that there is an error with the black cartridge. My printer will no longer work at all because it is in "error mode" even when I take out the faulty cartridge. These pens were on my wish list and, I received an alert that they were part of a Lightening Deal. I was  looking forward to trying them.What I received was a  flimsy square plastic box with pens standing up in it. Some of the pens had lost their caps and they were at the bottom of the box.I can't review  the whole set because I didn't receive the whole 108 pens. I received 78, so my box was missing 30 pens. This was really disappointing.What I found about the pens that I was able to use. Is that the ink cartridges were either smaller or not filled as full as other gel pens I have used (I.e Lolliz, Fiskar) , as they ran out of ink very quickly in my estimation.Based on these things I wouldn't buy them again or recommend them to others.

Well, I had written a review when we first got this in May, 2017.  Now, less than 60 days later the dang thing is jammed open, unable to operate and is simply is a hunk of metal that cost just over $30.00.  I am very very disappointed with the product and the company.  I have to get another stapler but will not be from this company - ever again.  After all, how difficult could it be to make a stapler?

The good: Great flow, fantastic colorThe bad: Not nearly as permanent as other Noodler's inksAfter being astounded by the quality (and permanence) of Noodler's Bulletproof Black, I was looking for a similar permanent blue ink to complement it, and decided to try Bad Belted Kingfisher. It's a good ink with amazing color, but lacks the staying power I was looking for. In water, a good amount of it runs and washes away. Other reviews claim that this smearing behavior is a "security feature", but Noodler's Black doesn't smear at all after it dries. When exposed to bleach or peroxide, Kingfisher fades a great deal. The remaining marks are still legible, but leave much to be desired.I returned Kingfisher and replaced it with Bad Blue Heron, with which I am much more impressed.
I SHOULD'VE GIVEN IT ZERO STARS.THE PRODUCT I RECEIVED WAS FAKE!

After breathing a lot of extra ozone from my laser printer, I decided to write a quick review about this product to warn others.  The paper will not load into the printer feeder and I have to try over an over until I get the right number of sheet in the hopper, take out and re-load, etc.  I have had my Samsung ML-1430 laser printer for almost a decade and it has been great, now with this paper, it will not load into the printer.  Maybe I was using 24lb before and this is too light, but I assumed "copy and print" meant it was general use.  Anyway, very frustrating as printing is now a nightmare.  If you have a laser printer, consider spending a few extra bucks on some heavier paper (just my guess at the problem).

Not fit for its purpose. It's fine if you intend to use it on perfectly flat ground but if there are uneven spots be prepared to have your cart topple over and everything fall out. The front wheels as mentioned in previous reviews are too small. Certainly not suitable for a senior who wants to use it for shopping, just in case someone is looking for that purpose. Look elsewhere. We regret buying it but my husband can't be bothered returning it, he will probably never use it again after the fiasco of our recent shopping trip in Chicago.

Normally dont review things like ink cartridges. Bought what I thought was brand new, good quality, from HP andddddd the cyan doesnt actually work. Its full, I see the ink, but it wont stay in the slot. Nothing like paying money for a defect.

The one star is because if the box contains what I  ordered, the product itself gets 0 stars for the shoddy quality control, I don't know if this has happened to anyone else, I have ordered this before and it has worked, this time all my prints come out in white and yellow, even the black and white. Against all the reviews I still purchased this item (2).  All the reviews were correct, the magnets are extremely weak. I had to purchase magnetic tape to put on the holder to properly fit in my work locker. Magnets are very weak just be aware

Like other reviewers have said this ink expired rapidly. Light printing, black and white only over the course of a about a month and all 3 of these cartridges are now showing empty. Do not buy this product from amazon.

I own 2 Brother printers. I bought these ink cartridges based on positive reviews. How can there be so many reviewers saying they work perfectly when i used them on two different "compatible" printers and I have had nothing but problems. Labels didn’t match each other and one was packaged upside down (they’re “stuck” together by design).  Amazon wouldn’t take back, HP didn’t care when I contacted them.  DO NOT BUY THIS.  TRYING TO GET THE RATING DOWN SO PEOPLE WON’T THINK THIS IS A GOOD PRODUCT!!!!

I got this item because the reviews looked pretty good, but I'm sorry to say it's a piece of junk. The mounting magnets are too weak to hold the board up, the dry erase marker doesn't work, and neither does the stamp. Nice idea, terrible execution.
Wheel broke on first use. See photo. If it weren't for the wheels, I would give it 3 stars because it is too short for tall people to comfortably push.

Office Marshal Chair Mat for Carpet Floors, Low/Medium Pile - 36" x 48", Multiple Sizes - 100% Pure Polycarbonate, No-Recycling Material - Transparent, High Impact Strength After 3-4 months of daily use the mat cracked in multiple locations where my chair casters get positioned. I never like giving a bad review yet here I am doing so.Of the 2 cartridge only one works & not very well. Sendingthese back.

These at first write beautifully, but run out of ink in a very short time (20 standard pages or so, compared to 80 or more from the competition). At that rate, paying full price for brand name Parker refills is actually a better deal. Won't purchase again.

I had a rubber stamp that I used monthly for about 15 years. I only ever had to add some extra ink to the pad every couple of years, but otherwise it was a workhorse until the plastic broke last month while I was pressing down on it. Searched for the exact replacement and found it here. Only this stamp is now literally half the size as my old one. (See pic.) It's going to be a lot harder now to actually write anything on those lines it's so small. Not happy with it. I give it two stars because it is usable, does give a clean stamp impression, and the ink tray is more accessible making it easier than my last one to add ink. But that's just a consolation to its deficient size.

Absolute garbage.  I couldnt even test it because the toner from 2 different cartridges spilled all over my printer and now it wont work.  Save yourself the trouble and buy the brother kind or at least some other aftermarket brand with better reviews.

I have 2 other paperpro staplers. Both work great for years. Thought this was the same. It is not. It just doesn't work. Plan to return it but Amazon just credited my account. This is the first time I have written a bad review, but felt I needed to warn other customers.  I received a bad batch of mailers.  There are small perferations in them and some of the sides are not sealed.  These bags cannot be used.  I understand that these things can happen (I have a business of my own), but there is a problem!  I am happy to return them, however VALUEMAILERS will not reimburse me for return shipping. I can't get a refund unless I return them and its not worth paying the price, so in other words "they ripped me off".  These mailers are going in the trash so I basically threw my money away with them.  DO NOT BUY FROM VALUEMAILERS!  They do not stand behind their products and they have THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE!

My wife and I sing in the church choir and we use three-ring binders to keep our music in. My wife got the bright idea to put a pencil bag in the binders to keep highlighters and pencils it so I ordered these Omura pouches.They are well-made and colorful, but only two of them had the holes in the correct place to go in a standard three-ring binder. This is the reason for the 2-Star rating. You would think that someone making pencil pouches for THREE-RING BINDERS would know how to space the holes. NOT!  Therefore no matter how good the material, three out of five are useless. Look at different brands. Not Omura.........

I bought this for our RV medicine cabinet.. The adhesive does not stick to the wall. The strip keeps falling off the wall. The magnetic side barely holds small items like tweezers, nail clippers, etc. The reviews on this are inaccurate.

This binder sucks and is not at all what I think of when I hear "ultra duty", the outer covers are quite soft and pretty lack luster.The rings have very mediocre closing force, and the top ring on mine has a small gap that is just big enough for pages to catch everytime I flip through the contents of the binder.If this was a cheap $4 dollar item, I'd give it a good review.  But now when I was shopping around for the most durable binder and selected this one based off the description.Buyer beware.

I was very excited to try this ink stamp, i thought it would be a good buy due to its high reviews, but i was disappointed.It is not hard to prepare the letters, but the stamp leaves ink around the borders.I used it on hard clothing hang tag and the ink would smudge around the letters, making it look cheap and unreadable.The worse part is the ink holder. It’s just a plastic that holds it and doesn’t fit the stamp. Everytime i used it, it would get my fingers dirty and i’ll have to go wash it, still leaving my fingers stained. I work with fabric so this is a big no no.

I BOUGHT TWO OF THESES FOR MY BROTHER DCP-7020 THINKING I WAS GETTING A GREAT DEAL...BOTH UNITS ARE LEAKING AND CONSTANTLY JAMMING...I GET THE MSG. "DUST ON THE DRUM", CLEAN THE DRUM AND AM ABLE TO MAKE ANOTHER COPY OR TWO BEFORE THE PROCESS REPEATS ITSELF...I HAVE ORDERED THE BROTHER TN-350 FROM AMAZON (IF THEY EVER SHIP IT)...PRETTY DISGUSTED W/AMAZON RIGHT NOW!!!...WOULD GIVE THIS ZERO STARS IF I COULD!!!
This ballpoint refill is awful. I don't know how Schmidt gets good reviews. The ink flow is sludgy, and the shade of green is light and drab, almost faded looking. This was a ripoff.

The reason for one stars is the cost....the reflective optical coating is coming off and i strongly suggest better buy another with few extra $$. That's the reason why there is 150days warranty. I purchased this scale and it never did weigh accurately,as much as 6 ounces off. When you need exact weights, this is not the one for you. Back here looking for a good scale today. Only rating a 1 star because something is required. Hope the trash diggers at the dump dont find it and think it is worth something.

I normally don't write reviews, but I was very disappointed by this paper.  I never had any problem with my Brother printer until using this paper.  I had repeated jams.  I will not be purchasing this paper again.

Did I have to give it even one star.  It deserves minus 5 stars.  This black and silver Parker Pen came with blue ink, but it was not a Black and Silver.  It only looked Black and Silver through the bubble wrap. It was a Navy blue and silver gang color pen.  These guys are rip offs.  They should not be allowed to sell on Amazon. It has some kind of goofy orange screw in casing to go along with it in case your dog or if you have a small child who might start chewing on it.  Then, you have a replacement. I should have just bought a Parker for a more expensive price with the black ink and covering with silver because I would have been paying less after I have to buy replacement black ink. Good concept, liked the freedom of having it retract or stay open.Except it broke in less than 5 days. Normal usage.The clip came out and the no tension stay stopped operating. Now it's just a regular retractable holder even if I tried the tension tab control.If the housing breaks this is getting 1 star.
These don't stick like they should. I have them two stars because my gran kids can stick them all over the place and they peel right off. They like the colors.

Got gifted for Christmas, read reviews for setup alongside a wired gaming headset, instantly put back in box. You NEED a Bluetooth transmitter if you care at all maintaining sound quality through your headset. Using this to listen to music with a wireless headset or earbuds might be great, but not even close to worth the price for what you lose in audio with a wired headset. Garbage.

I don't usually write reviews but after owning this for four months, it's broken.This product is not recommended for heavy use.  If you are going to use this product every day, don't waste your money.Spend more and buy a real stapler.

I would give this zero stars if I could.  Shortly after I started using this cartridge, after maybe 30 prints or so, the prints starting having a shaded look.  It looks like the entire page has been given a slight shading.  Can't return it because I, like most people, bought it ahead of time in anticipation of my other cartridge running out so didn't install it for a few months.
